arts.ttl: Hull City boss Ruben Selles hails 'massive' win at Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: Ruben Selles hailed Hull City's 1-0 win at Blackburn Rovers as the Tigers ended 2024 with perhaps one of their most important, saying it was massive for the club. "We performed as good as the opponent, and I think we took our chances.

arts.ttl: 'Golden chances' - John Eustace echoes Blackburn Rovers view after Hull defeat
arts.sum: The Blackburn Rovers head coach shared the view of media and supporters after a frustrating defeat to the Tigers

arts.ttl: Ryan Longman’s first goal of season guides Hull to victory over Blackburn
arts.sum: Ryan Longman’s first goal of the season 13 minutes from the end was enough.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings as Cantwell and Beck misses prove costly
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers player ratings after a disappointing defeat to Hull City

arts.ttl: Hull City player ratings at Blackburn Rovers as Alfie Jones stars and Longman ends drought
arts.sum: Hull City ended 2024 with a crucial 1-0 win at play-off-chasing Blackburn Rovers thanks to a late goal from Ryan Longman, to move out of the relegation zone. Ryan Longman finished brilliantly after being played in by Regan Slater; the goal coming after the Tigers had, at times, rode their luck against in-form Rovers, but in the process.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers sucker-punched by Hull City after wasteful finishing
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers ended 2024 with a home defeat after missing big chances against Hull City

arts.ttl: Ryan Longman bags late winner to secure huge Hull City win at Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: City roared in front 77 minutes in when Ryan Longman stepped off the bench to score his first Tigers goal in more than two years, delicately firing in after the away side won the ball high in the Rovers half. City had early shouts for a penalty on Kamara waved away by the referee before Rovers threatened when Callum Brittain's cross hit Jones and flew behind Pandur's post, with the goalkeeper rooted to the spot in what was a fairly frenetic opening ten minutes in the Lancashire rain.

arts.ttl: Three clubs in the running to sign Hull City attacker – Player keen to move on
arts.sum: There’s a claim in the Turkish media that Hull City attacker Abdülkadir Ömür is keen on a return to Turkey during the January transfer window and that there are multiple interested clubs. arts.sum: Sheffield United have joined Blackburn Rovers and Burnley in the chase for UD Las Palmas striker Oli McBurnie,… The post Sheffield United battling Blackburn Rovers, Burnley for striker reunion deal appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Hull City man on Ruben Selles, the Championship relegation fight and Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: Sean McLoughlin says it's crucial that Hull City bounce back after the disappointment of their 1-0 Boxing Day defeat at Preston North End when they face Blackburn Rovers on Sunday afternoon. We need to bounce back from it," the Irishman told Hull Live as he looked back on the Deepdale disappointment and 2024 as a whole.
